name: Linux VM Test
author: realtvalexfncloud@gmail.com
description: Startet eine Mini-VM im Container mit automatischem vm.sh Download.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
apt update -y && apt install -y curl
curl -fsSL ${VM_SCRIPT_URL:-https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realtvalexfncloud-sys/Pterodactyl-egg/main/vm.sh} -o /home/container/vm.sh
chmod +x /home/container/vm.sh
echo "[DONE] vm.sh installiert."
